timeline.author: Pyrofab
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,5 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_2960 net/minecraft/util/Identifier
+	COMMENT The namespace and path must only contain either [a-z] (a letter), [0-9] (a digit), or the characters '_', '.', and '-'.

timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -28,4 +29,12 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2960 net/minecraft/util/Identifier
 		ARG 0 path
 	METHOD method_20209 isNamespaceValid (Ljava/lang/String;)Z
 		ARG 0 namespace
+	METHOD <init> (Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;)V
+		ARG 1 namespace
+		ARG 2 path
+	METHOD <init> (Ljava/lang/String;)V
+		ARG 1 id
+			COMMENT A string of the form <path>:<namespace>, for example minecraft:iron_ingot.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	COMMENT The namespace and path must only contain either [a-z] (a letter), [0-9] (a digit), or the characters '_', '.', and '-'. The path can also have a '/'.
          
          
            
            	COMMENT The namespace and path must contain only lowercase letters ([a-z]), digits ([0-9]), or the characters '_', '.', and '-'. The path can also contain the standard path separator '/'.
          
      
    
    
  

I think this is preferable to a less verbose RegEx description for doc.
